job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: This Data Analyst will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and offers transparency into customer behavior and business performance. Essential duties and responsibilities include but not limited to: • Strong analytic skills and ability to develop dashboard and reports using Tableau to enable customers to analyze data and make business decisions. • Ability to work iteratively and converts business requirements quick prototypes with different Visualization options • Ability to understand core business questions needing answered • Ability to write custom calculations (or queries) within the data visualization tool Tableau. • Solid understanding of Tableau presentation and data layer and implementation of Security with Tableau • Experience in rolling out Tableau as Self-service solution for large number of users • Hands on experience in Tableau reporting, Tableau server management • Experience in building Integration of Tableau with like MS SQL • Ability to consult business users to build Tableau dashboards • This role will require collaboration with end users, project stakeholders, and support partners to identify needs, goals, metric measurements, and business models which will result in easy-to-understand interfaces and enable end users to quickly identify key themes within the data
